attributes.action: Give care workers in England a £500 bonus like they did in Wales
attributes.background: I have worked through lockdown in this country since day one of this pandemic but key workers in England I believe have been overlooked! So far I have received a £10 gift voucher from my employee where as in Wales the government gave all care workers a £500 bonus where's our recognition

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320495
